alert.note: Alert for Alger; Dickinson; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 4:03PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN DICKINSON... SOUTHEASTERN MARQUETTE AND WEST CENTRAL ALGER COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 402 PM EDT/302 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Negaunee to 7 miles southeast of Ishpeming to 13 miles west of Gwinn. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Marquette, Ishpeming, Presque Isle, Negaunee, K. I. Sawyer Airport, Little Presque Isle, Deerton, Trowbridge Park, Harvey, Gwinn, Sands, Skandia, Shot Point, Laughing Whitefish Falls, Beaver Grove, The 553 and 480 Crossroads, Little Lake, Sugarloaf Mountain, Big Bass Lake, and Palmer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
